output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF:11240017" is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Directly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu", who is one of the presidential candidates (Position 3)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Targets a large audience (500,001-1,000,000 people) - Uses hashtags (#Suceava, #Cluj, #Dej, #România) to increase reach - Has received significant impressions (15,000-19,999)
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Promotes PSD government and Marcel Ciolacu specifically - Uses campaign slogans ("calea sigură pentru Cluj, calea sigură pentru România") - Links infrastructure projects to party success - Clear attempt to influence voters by associating positive developments with the candidate
5. Journalism: No - This is not journalistic content - It's clearly promotional material with political messaging - Contains campaign slogans and party-specific messaging
6. Personal opinion: No - This is a structured, paid political advertisement - Contains official campaign messaging and CMF number

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Is a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - Has clear electoral objectives - Uses campaign slogans and messaging - Links infrastructure achievements to party success
conclusion.message-for-police: MEGASOFT SYSTEMS SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propagandă electorală după încheierea campaniei electorale pentru alegerile prezidențiale, într-o postare sponsorizată pe Facebook și Instagram (ID: 291752920699971). Postarea promovează explicit candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU și partidul PSD, folosind sloganuri de campanie și asocieri pozitive cu proiecte de infrastructură, având un CMF alocat (11240017), ceea ce confirmă natura sa de propagandă electorală. Materialul a fost difuzat după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale.
